title: Account Stolen!!!
body: so i was stupid and thought id click a link for once since it was someone in my friends list who sent it and bam, got kicked from my own account, got a ticken, how long am i suppose to wait? (this is my smurf)

replies.body: Sorry to hear about this ruse, but don't worry!  We can work with you individually and help to recover your account.  Hit us up through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and our account recovery team will assist.  Since you've already put in a ticket, just hang tight.  Make sure not to reply to the ticket until a response is received, otherwise you'll go back to the bottom of the queue.  We'll reply back as soon as we can!
